name: International Sales Manager
description:
Since 2007, the Latera Company has specialized in software development for telecoms and companies whose business is based on a subscription model.

Our main product is Hydra billing. It is a convergent, prepaid and postpaid turnkey billing solution with pre-integrated Provisioning, Mediation, Self-Care and Payment modules.

Sales Manager is responsible for building strong customer relationships in the field and ensuring a great customer experience with existing and potential customers. In this role you will be responsible for the international market as your main focus, but will also support CIS region. A key aspect of this role is to develop Latera’s high-tech software solution portfolio across the globe.

This will include growing the territory/account base to attain financial objectives.

  • Understanding customers’ business and solution requirements

  • Gain share of wallet/spend in OSS/BSS Solutions

  • Territory/account management, including account sales planning and sales forecasting and engaging cross-functional resources

  • Cooperating with Sales Representatives in a given territory to unite forces leading to expanded sales.

  • Customarily and regularly engaged with decision makers at client facilities in performing primary duties

  • Leads sales process and utilizes all available resources to manage account

Essential Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s Degree (BSc/BA) and at least 3 years of experience in a relationship selling role where you were recognised as a top performer

  • Strong communication, collaboration, negotiation and executive presentation skills and proficient in working with CIO/CTO and next 2 levels down

  • Experience with infrastructure sales projects combined with working knowledge of OSS/BSS solutions, hardware and software.

  • Driven by achieving a high level of customer satisfaction and can demonstrate a track record in this area

  • Ability to work in a fast paced entrepreneurial environment as well as highly developed planning and organisation skills

  • Fluent English language knowledge.

  • High-level of customer management and strategic selling skills to enhance the success of our customers’ business and the growth of Latera LLC

Desirable Requirements:

  • Technical education in the field of IT or telecommunications will be an advantage.

  • Experience in a technical sales / pre-sales / technical enablement role responsible for infrastructure sales projects will be an advantage.

  • Fluent Spanish language knowledge.

Conditions:

  • Training in all the details of our product and the peculiarities of the industry;

  • Strong marketing support for sales;

  • An undiscovered international market;

  • The job that you love and where you will get new skills and higher your level;

  • Salary, which depends on your diligence and has no upper limit;

  • Flexible schedule, 8-hour working day with a break for lunch;

  • Possibility to work remotely;

  • Coffee, tea, green apples.
